title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags, the dynamic text content type has no effect and the content is not displayed correctly.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Set up a database field with HTML text within <html>...</html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and Text with RTF tags. 2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field. 3. Observe that the content is not displayed correctly and the dynamic text content type has no effect.
